Remember_me

Superclass representation of remember_me records in the DB.

Properties

  • __table = ‘remember_me’ - table name
  • code - varchar(32) primary_key not_null
  • user_id - int(4) not_null
  • modified - timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

schemaDef

public static function schemaDef()

Returns an array representing the table schema in the DB.

Returns an array representing the table schema in the DB.
